Summary: Strange blue light over my barn that seamed to grow in size and get brighter
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chesterville
There were no other sightings in Chesterville on or around December 25th 1983
divs: Sighting DetailsBack in 2004 or 2005 my brother and I noticed a Strange blue light that gets bigger and brighter after a thunder storm over my barn. One night the power was out and me and my brother was standing in the kitchen looking out towards the road because we saw this bright blue light that seamed to just get brighter and brighter with no explanation. We thought Ok is this a car? Why is this light getting brighter and brighter and bigger? We opened the door and went outside and before we could make our way to the barn the light just vanished and we had an eery feeling so we went back inside the house.
